body.description: Comfort and style go hand in hand when it comes to Delta Children's LX side by side stroller. Designed to accommodate any growing family, it features plenty of storage, a parent cup holder and a five point safety harness for peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Size: 23.4" x 29.9" x 37" About Delta Children Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. Today, we’re one of the largest family-owned company in the juvenile products industry, and trusted by millions of families worldwide. We design and manufacture a wide range of furniture products for the early childhood years--and beyond, providing children with safe places to sleep, play and explore Delta Children LX Side by Side Stroller Easy Exploring for the Whole Family The LX Side by Side Stroller from Delta Children is loaded with features that makes traveling with two children easier than ever! This double stroller provides protection from sun, wind or rain with its large canopy, reclines for your children’s comfort, and folds up for easy storage. Available in a number of fashionable colors! Optimal Comfort & Safety: A large European style canopy protects your little ones from the elements | Multi-position recline| 5-point safety harness with soft shoulder pads Smooth Ride: 360 degree shock absorbing front wheels glide over bumps for a smooth ride Ideal Convenience: Includes 2 large hanging storage bags for your own and baby’s essentials | Parent cup holder for extra convenience Easy Exploring: Fits through a standard 30" door Easy Storage And Travel: The lightweight frame with compact umbrella fold enables easy storage and travel

Product Features Protection from the Elements The stroller's large canopy protects children from sun, wind or rain. Comfy Recline The multiple position recline on each seat allows you to adjust the recline to each child's needs. Easily Explore Fits through standard 30 inch wide doors. Travel Friendly The compact umbrella fold allows for easy storage and travel. Weighs about 19 lbs.

Available in An Array of Fun and Stylish Color Options! Lime & Green (013) A cool pop of icy green color peeks out from the canopy for your little trendsetters. Available in An Array of Fun and Stylish Color Options! Black & Orange (820) Vivid orange piping accents the canopy for a bold, but sophisticated touch of color. Available in An Array of Fun and Stylish Color Options! Red & Grey (026) Stroll in style with a pop of vibrant red in the interior of the canopy and harness. Available In An Array of Fun and Stylish Color Options! Night Sky (406) A punchy pop of bright blue accents the piping of the canopy and harness for your too-cool kiddos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite double stroller for travel
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased this same stroller multiple times over the years for my 6 kids.Pros: it is super lightweight, compact, easy to fold and open, and comfortable for the kids!!!Cons: it’s sturdy, but not all THAT sturdy. This is definitely not designed to be an every day stroller.I have purchased this for various vacations to both our local beach/boardwalk and Walt Disney World.It is unbeatable for the price, in my opinion.It’s got better features than a lot of other double umbrella strollers on the market for this price, including better canopies, good harnesses and roomy, comfy seats for the kids.When you’ve got 6 kids, luggage and a million things to worry about in the airport, this stroller gives you one less thing to worry about. It doesn’t take up much space, super easy to check on the plane, and it gives you somewhere safe and comfy to keep the smaller kids during your travels.My kids also were comfortable enough to nap in this stroller during our long days at the Florida theme parks.These strollers do, however, break rather easily with daily wear and tear. Though it lasted no problem during the trips, if we used it every day for walks at home, we’d experience different issues from wheels breaking, the seats wearing thin around the metal support beams, etc.If you plan to use it for vacations only, I could see it lasting a few trips. But with daily use, it probably could last 6 months to maybe a year at very most.Still, this is my favorite stroller for travel and if that’s what you’re looking for, go for it! (If you’re traveling to Disney, make sure to buy a stroller bag for the airport and a rain cover too! 😉)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travelling with 2 kids
reviews.reviewText: We bought it for our international and domestic travels with 2 kids. But this turned out to be so good and easy to use, that we use it frequently on a daily basis. It folds perfectly and takes up much less space compared to our other double stroller.Love the colour! Storage is very limited. But that's more than expected from an umbrella stroller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: We had the graco duoglider and I HATED it. Oh man it's big and bulky and hard to maneuver. I NEEDED something smaller and much more lightweight because I take the kiddos for a lot of walks and I was just so tired of trying to push that hulking thing around.This side by side stroller is a million times better. It has fit through every doorway we've tried and it can turn on a dime(we do a lot of circles to keep the banies happy when we have to stop). It even offroads well lol.I love the five point harnesses and the seats are comfy. The sun shade is small. But for this price, we just bought a shade extender and still saved money. The overall quality is beyond my expectations. I expected it to be kind of flimsy or unsteady but it is very very sturdy and seems very well put together.It's so small for a double stroller! It folds up so compact and saves us a ton a of room in our trunk!The cup holder kind of sucks but that's not a problem for us at all. We usually have water Bottles so we can just stick them in one of the decent sized pouches hanging from the back.All in all I'm very satisfied with this stroller and I'm beyond glad that I made the switch!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I would like to say that this came already put together and all I had to do was snap 2 wheels on it. That alone was worth the money to me because I don’t have much time to spend putting a bunch of stuff together, so I was impressed right away. It’s very lightweight, easy to fold and carry, and it rides pretty smooth. It has mesh pockets on the back of each seat for storage. It did come with a cup holder but I’ve found it doesn’t stay on so I just took it off and use the storage space for any bottles.Now for the few cons. The handles on it are a little awkward and I feel if you are above 5’7 it wouldn’t work well for you. Sometimes I find myself hunched over a bit just trying to push it because the handles are so low. I would avoid buying this one if you’re any taller unless you don’t mind back pain after 30 minutes of walking. The next thing is that it does NOT fit through a normal doorway easily. It’s a hassle getting in and out of my front door any time I take the kids for a walk. So that’s a bit frustrating. Another small thing is the straps are a little hard to adjust, at least on mine. The part where you’re supposed to pull to make it looser is hard to get ahold of and it was pretty frustrating for me because I finally got it after trying for a week. It’s almost like it was put on backwards or something and if you have even the slightest “big” hands or fingers you most likely will struggle getting it.Overall those are pretty minor things for me, it fits both of my kids and the positive things make it worth it. Especially for how inexpensive it is, you can’t really beat it
